inventoryData.name: Drumming
inventoryData.description: You can easily record your own tracks, and jam out with this awesome drum set. 40 New Preset Kits, 200 User Kits and over 400 New Voices.Faithful reproduction of real sound and ambience recorded in a well-known studio .

inventoryData.name: Jewerly making
inventoryData.description: Spend your time creating unique jewerly. This type of hobby can even be monitized, or even add on to your wardrobe. Let your imagination go wild.

inventoryData.name: Photography
inventoryData.description: Capture the outdoors, create cool image. Possibilities are endless with this hobby

inventoryData.name: Cocktail mixing
inventoryData.description: Most people love a good cocktail. Mix and match and explore different tastes. Entertain guests with your new inventions

inventoryData.name: Indoor gardening
inventoryData.description: What a great way to decorate your home, and have fun in the process. Did you know that some indoor plants can even help clean the air? Check out this great hobby

inventoryData.name: Bread Making
inventoryData.description: Everyone loves to eat. Why not check out this great way to pass some time, and eat too. There are so many different kinds of bread; who knew?! And most of all , you can choose the healthy options since you are the one baking them

inventoryData.name: Sewing
inventoryData.description: Great book to get started! Learning how to sew has never been simpler! Like having a personal instructor at your side, this beginners guide teaches you to sew stitches both by hand and with a machine

inventoryData.name: Origami
inventoryData.description: You are going to have a blast with this one. Bend it , shape it, twist it. Create intricate shapes, and even use it for decorating

inventoryData.name: Knitting
inventoryData.description: You can knit sweaters, gloves, gifts, hats. possibilities are almost endless with this one.

inventoryData.name: Paint by number
inventoryData.description: This is surprisingly fun! You can create your own art at home with little or no artistic skills. Just follow the number patterns, get your brush ready, and off you go. Great and relaxing way to spend the time.

inventoryData.name: Costume making/Cosplay
inventoryData.description: How fun will it be to make your own costumes. Into cosplay? or love halloweens? this guide is great for getting started

inventoryData.name: Cofee Roasting
inventoryData.description: Love coffee? always wanted to get that perfect test and blend. This guide can get your started

inventoryData.name: Magnetic Tiles
inventoryData.description: Let the kid imagination run wild with this creative toy. Build houses, cars, and anything they can imagine. Lots of hours of fun

inventoryData.name: Rock Painting
inventoryData.description: Have young kids with passion in arts? How about rock decorating! Glow in the dark painted rocks can be used for decorating rooms. Grown ups can participate in this one too. Check this one out

inventoryData.name: RC Cars
inventoryData.description: Have fun outside with this awesome RC car.

inventoryData.name: model Kits
inventoryData.description: This is fun, and most of all the parents can join in on the fun.

inventoryData.name: Magic Kits
inventoryData.description: Learn magic, have your kids entertain others. Either way, this is a fun hobby to engage in

inventoryData.name: Archery
inventoryData.description: Hone your skills in archery. You can practice this in a safe space, or even enter into competitive local games

inventoryData.name: outdoor painting
inventoryData.description: Enjoy the great outdoors, and paint it at the same time. Capture the streams, oceans, and landascape. This is a great hobby!.

inventoryData.name: Paint Ball
inventoryData.description: Dodge, shoot!, roll, plan, and win. This is a great way to enjoy a good time with friends.

inventoryData.name: Done flying
inventoryData.description: There is a huge community of drone enthusiasts. This hobby can easily morph into aerial photography, or even nature videography. Great way to spend time outdoor

inventoryData.name: Rock Climbing
inventoryData.description: This is perfect for couples! There are indoor rock climbing gyms nearby. Defeat obstacle courses together, and having fun doing it
